mapper.select: SELECT c.cid AS customer_id, p.ot AS order_time, pr.img AS image, pr.cat AS category, pr.name AS product_name, pd.qty AS quantity, pd.price AS total_price, p.st AS delivery_status FROM customer c JOIN purchase p ON c.cid = p.cid JOIN purchase_detail pd ON p.pid = pd.pid JOIN product pr ON pd.prd_id = pr.pid WHERE c.email = #{email} ORDER BY p.ot DESC;
